articles.description: People with psychosis are usually given powerful medication - in Norway they can now choose to go drug-free.
articles.content:
By Lucy Proctor and Linda PresslyBBC News
image captionArt therapy helps Malin manage her condition
Most people with psychosis take powerful drugs to keep delusions and hallucinations at bay - but … [+12143 chars]

articles.title: Japan finds new COVID-19 strain, while immigration centre reports infections - Reuters
articles.description: Japan confirmed a new variant of COVID-19, and an infection cluster emerged at a Tokyo immigration facility, presenting new challenges as the country tries to overcome a third wave of the pandemic.
articles.content:
By Reuters Staff
